title: mahEshvarI kAvumA rAgA:
sahitya:
mahEshvarI kAvumA umA mApati sOdari mAtangi tanu


anupallavi

  mahAdEva mAnini manOnmaNi mahEndra tyupAsita vara caraNA


caraNam    mrDhANi mrgEndra vAhanE madhukara muraLIgAna vinOdini mOhini 
murmara kOTi nibha sundaramukhi sumukha janani shrta samudAya pAlini
